ResearchProjectDef.label: Arcade machine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a bulky, coin-operated arcade cabinet with an aging CRT screen and colorful buttons. It provides hours of digital entertainment for your colonists.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Darts board
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a simple dartboard mounted on a stand, a fun way for colonists to practice accuracy and hand-eye coordination. Using it slowly trains shooting ability.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Roulette table
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a sophisticated gambling table designed for playing roulette. A thrilling mix of chance and strategy, the game is a centerpiece of any high-end casino or social space.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Industrial radio
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a device for playing music and spoken broadcasts. Even on mostly uninhbabited planets, there is often an old transmitter running something at least marginally interesting. Provides passive music recreation to those that can hear it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Longwave radio
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build an improved state-of-the-art, high-fidelity radio that uses advanced longwave transmission to deliver crystal-clear music, broadcasts, and interstellar transmissions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Personal computer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a bulky computer for personal use. It can run basic software which can entertain and slowly train colonist intellectual skills.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Modern computer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a sleek, high-performance computing station. Equipped with a fast processor, an ergonomic keyboard, and a crisp, flat-panel display. It allows colonists to train their intelligence, research, and entertain themselves.
